basic.description: A survey of British imperialism from the late 18th century through to the 1960s with a thematic focus on imperial expansion and decline, imperial ideologies and power, and the impact of empire on Britain.
basic.subject: HIST
basic.title: The British Imperial World

extra.enrollment_requirement:
PREREQUISITE    Level 2 or above
EXCLUSION    No more than 1 course from HIST 254/6.0; HIST 276/3.0
